name: BarbiBreaker
description:
Team RedartedGames

Creators: Adam Głów, Wojciech Mosieński, Piotr Stefański, Agnieszka Nowacka

The game has been made localy on Huuuge GameJam 24h

Details:

Local multi racade (1v1).

Barbi fights with Ken in the plastic world. The Player who is able to stay longer on color blocks wins! You can enlarge your chances by using power ups.
Let's go party!
